---

description: "The “server live” API indicates if the inference server is able to receive and respond to metadata and inference requests. The “server live” API can be used directly to implement the Kubernetes livenessProbe."

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/v2/health/live"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



The “server live” API indicates if the inference server is able to receive and respond to metadata and inference requests. The “server live” API can be used directly to implement the Kubernetes livenessProbe.

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"OK"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
